brightness: 200 cd/mÂ² Measurement of light output. The higher the brightness, the more visible the picture will be in rooms with a lot of light.
contrast_ratio: 600:1 typical; 3,000,000:1 dynamic Difference between the brightest white and the darkest black a display can reproduce. The higher the contrast ratio, the better the color detail.
resolution: 1600 x 900 Maximum number of pixels a monitor is capable of displaying. The higher the resolution, the sharper the image.
